Achieved the IBM Certified IT Specialist certification in 2012 Able to build long term client relationship and became trusted adviser to clients and has engaged with IT and C level leaders to revamp in addition to various banking and government new business initiatives Work Experience 10 2014 to Current Manager Advisory Performance Improvement Company Name City State GST implementation
